flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: A good steam punk costume needs to reflect true history and the wearer's personality. Research is a must.
guide.introduction_rendered: A good steam punk costume needs to reflect true history and the wearer's personality. Research is a must.
guide.summary: A history based steampunk inspired pumpkin gardener costume.
guide.title: Steampunk gardener
